title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Personalized Educational Design for Optimizing Brain-Computer Interface Training in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics and statistics knowledge, understanding of machine learning concepts, and basic principles of brain-computer interface (BCI)
context.additional_context: Hands-on learning environment incorporating digital devices and BCI (Brain-Computer Interface) simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can generate personalized BCI training sequences by applying reinforcement learning algorithms.
Learners can understand the principles of the PAID algorithm and design optimization strategies using simulation data.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate and compare the effectiveness of BCI training through team-based projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
